adv: The tool is very dynamic and it allow users to quickly select the variables required to answer their questions.
disadv: I'm not sure if the bubble chart visualization is the best visualization to use for some of the selection combinations. It can be a little difficult to orient yourself to figure out what the bubbles are conveying
comment: Excellent job! I'd experiment with some of the other visualizations that are available. Different visualizations can allow users to quickly find the information that they're looking for without spending too much time studying the source data.
